code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:pt presents with mild feelings of terror in social situations, mild long standing inability to ride on elevators due to overwhelming fear accompanied by palpitations, diaphoresis and dyspnea and Mental Health. she is having symptoms 16-17 times a week, in spite of treatment. pt is a 37 YO female. Patient reports that she never drinks alcohol she does not smoke o:Height 67 in, Weight 103 lbs, Temperature 98.8 F, Pulse 86, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 16 a:Anxiety p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Buspirone - 15 mg /day, and ordered GAD - 7 Assessment Tool.

s:37 yo female presents with 3 years history of mild diarrhea, mild vertigo. pt reports mild nausea. o:Height 67 in, Weight 104 lbs, Temperature 99 F, Pulse 87, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 17, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = mild tenderness a:Nausea p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed prochlorperazine - 40 mg daily (oral dose), and ordered Basic Metabolic Panel.

s:patient presents with 5 months history of mild diarrhea. pt is a 39 year old female. she denies smoking denies any alcohol use o:Height 67 in, Weight 105 lbs, Temperature 99 F, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 17, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = mild tenderness a:Nausea p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed prochlorperazine - 40 mg daily (oral dose), and ordered CBC.

s:a 39 YO white f waiter indicates mild feelings of terror in social situations and mild long standing inability to ride on elevators due to overwhelming fear accompanied by palpitations, diaphoresis and dyspnea. o:Height 67 in, Weight 106 lbs, Temperature 99.1 F, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 18 a:Anxiety p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Buspirone - 15 mg /day, and ordered GAD - 7 Assessment Tool.
